definition[0]: used when speaking or writing to one or more people to show that something belongs to them or is connected with them
example[1]: Is that your brother over there?
example[2]: Don’t worry. It’s not your fault.
example[3]: Be aware of your own feelings.
definition[1]: of or belonging to any person
example[4]: If you are facing north, east is on your right.
definition[2]: used when mentioning something that is a typical example of a particular type of thing
example[5]: It was just your basic, ordinary hotel room – nothing special.
example[6]: Your typical 60s pop group had three guitarists and a drummer.
